img_summary: The image shows a sculpted object resembling a large, curved horn or tusk, mounted on a base. The horn is wrapped in a swirling, textured material that appears to be made of a dark, wood-like substance. The background is dimly lit, with hints of a mural or painting, suggesting an ancient or mystical setting.
